item.title: Brooklyn
item.description: Ingredients 50 ml rye whisky 20 ml dry vermouth 7.5 ml amaro 5 ml Maraschino liqueur orange twist Instructions Stir ingredients. Serve up. Garnish with orange twist.

item.title: Paper plane
item.description: Ingredients 20ml bourbon 20ml Aperol 20ml Amaro Nonino or Montenegro 20ml lemon juice lemon twist Instructions Shake ingredients. Serve in a cocktail glass. Garnish with lemon twist (or miniature paper plane).
